name: freecell-game-engine
description: An open source freecell game engine implemantation

scripts.test:cov: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel-node $(npm bin)/isparta cover $(npm bin)/_mocha -- --recursive
scripts.check:src: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.check:examples: npm run build:examples && npm run test:examples
scripts.buildCross: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run check:src && npm run build
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && gitbook build -g reactjs/redux
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cp CNAME _book && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:reactjs/redux gh-pages --force

author: Dor Tzur
